name: Notify.lk SMS for WooCommerce
author: Notify.lk

sections.description:
Notify.lk is a popular SMS gateway for Sri Lanka which you can use to send transactional or bulk SMS to your customers. This plugin allows you to integrate Notify.lk SMS service into your WooCommerce store.

Features

  • Send SMS to your customers automatically for any WooCommerce order status. You can let them know if you received the order, when they make the payment, you process the order, when the order is ready, when order is shipped or any custom event you define.
  • Receive an SMS to one or multiple admin mobile numbers when your store got a new order.
  • Send SMS when you add a customer note.
  • You can customize the content of every automated SMS.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. In the dashboard navigate to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for Notify.lk SMS for WooCommerce
  3. Locate the Notify.lk SMS for WooCommerce by Notify (Private) Limited and click Install Now
  4. After installation, click on Activate Plugin to activate

Manual Installation

  1. Download the zip file using the Download button above in this page
  2. In the dashboard navigate to Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on Upload Plugin
  4. Click Choose File then select the zip file you downloaded
  5. Click Install Now, wait for the installation and click Activate Plugin

Enabling the Landing Page

  1. In the dashboard, navigate to WooCommerce > Settings
  2. Go to Notify.lk SMS tab
  3. Fill all options required, and save the settings

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
How to sign-up for an account?

Go to our website https://www.notify.lk and register for an account.

Can this plugin send SMS?

Yes, if you are registered Notify.lk user, you can integrate this plugin with Notify.lk and trigger SMS automatically for WooCommerce order status updates and order note updates as well.

Intergrate Sri Lanka's Best SMS Provider with Your WooCommerce Store!

By budhajeewa on February 5, 2021

Notify.lk has been Sri Lanka's premier SMS service provider for quite a while. It was high time that they released a plugin for WooCommerce, as it is the most popular ecommerce solution for WordPress. Now that this is here, you have the ability to send custom transactional SMSes to your customers at various stages of their orders. You also have the option to send mass promotional SMSes, right from Notify.lk's own dashboard as well. So, do not be late to get the benefits of integrating Notify.lk with your WooCommerce store.

This plugin + their service added many value to my ecommerce business

By chethanamadhura on February 5, 2021

I was finding a SMS gateway in Sri Lanka from 2016 and found Notify in 2017. I have tried several SMS gateways and had many problems with previous services/plugins. Notify is great because their SMSs quickly deliver and also support for custom order status. That's the main reason for me to stick with this and there are many features in their own dashboard too. Highly recommended.
